fork_status_and_schedule.highlight: Fusaka mainnet date setting will trigger 1-week Glamsterdam non-headliner proposal deadline
Sepolia Shadow Fork launched; Fusaka-02 successfully activated with no issues

client_updates.highlight: Nimbus hitting CPU limits on 4-core systems at BPO1; supernode reconstruction takes 4+ seconds
Geth will convert legacy blob proofs to cell proofs indefinitely via RPC
Most clients dropping legacy blob proof support post-Fusaka; no network gossip

testing_progress.highlight: BAL devnet 0: Geth/Besu/Reth/Nethermind near interop-ready; 54 tests w/154 scenarios ready
BAL testing: 4 clients passing ~80% of 26 tests; specific metric proposals ready

repricing_updates.highlight: EIP-8007 bundles all Glamsterdam repricing proposals for tracking (informational only)
EIP-7904: Major compute repricing making most operations cheaper; harmonizing costs
EIP-8037: ~10x increase on state creation costs; independent co-deposit metering
EIP-8032: Dynamic S-Store pricing based on contract storage depth (exponential scaling)
EIP-8032 uses separate gas budget to avoid burn/coinbase accounting conflicts

organizational.highlight: Ansgar hosting through year-end; Tim returns after
BPO schedule: CL shouldn't append fork names; only use BPO numbers
Holesky deprecation reminder: end of month shutdown

eip_proposals.highlight: EIP-7791 (gas2eth): Pay contracts directly from TX origin using gas-denominated payments
EIP-7791: Separate gas limit prevents griefing; future tx type could set per-account limits
EIP-7923: Paged memory model with 512-page LRU cache for cheaper access

action_items.action: Review EIP BPO schedule changes: remove named fork fields from Genesis
Investigate backwards compatibility for repricing EIPs; gather breaking change feedback
Discuss EIP-7791 implications in Ethereum Magicians thread

decisions.decision: BPO schedule updates decoupled from named forks; only BPO numbers in Genesis

targets.target: Next ACDE (2 weeks): Begin Amsterdam non-headliner EIP discussion and prioritization
End of month - Holesky testnet shutdown
